main event: On August 6, 1956, multiple witnesses observed 3-4 objects in the sky over Potma, USSR for 15 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be ball-shaped and possibly balloons, The observation duration lasted for 15 minutes, The objects exhibited varied courses during the observation, Previous analysis indicates insufficient data to confirm the objects as aircraft or astronomical phenomena, Follow-up investigations in 1957 revealed a different object sighted near the same area at high speed and altitude.
witness description: The witnesses were observers at a communications check at a nearby airbase.
